extendedIngredients.name: dark chocolate chips
extendedIngredients.originalString: ¼ cup mini dark chocolate chips, to taste

extendedIngredients.name: sea salt
extendedIngredients.originalString: ¼ teaspoon sea salt, or more to taste

recipes.title: No Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Lara Bars - Paleo
recipes.instructions: Place tasted sunflower seeds into the bowl of a food processor. Whir for a couple of minutes and watch as the sunflower seeds turn into a flour and then start to clump up a bit as it converts towards a butter!Add in your dates and salt, and process to break up and pulverize the dates. Mixture should be sticky and press together easily. If not, add a tablespoon or two of melted coconut oil.Add in chocolate chips and pulse a few times just to mix.Press the sticky batter into an 8 x 8 or comparably sized pan. I like to line with waxed paper for easy removal.Press the mixture evenly into the dish.Refrigerate or freeze to firm up, then slice up into desired shapes & size.

steps.step: Place tasted sunflower seeds into the bowl of a food processor. Whir for a couple of minutes and watch as the sunflower seeds turn into a flour and then start to clump up a bit as it converts towards a butter!
Add in your dates and salt, and process to break up and pulverize the dates.
Mixture should be sticky and press together easily. If not, add a tablespoon or two of melted coconut oil.

Add in chocolate chips and pulse a few times just to mix.Press the sticky batter into an 8 x 8 or comparably sized pan. I like to line with waxed paper for easy removal.Press the mixture evenly into the dish.Refrigerate or freeze to firm up, then slice up into desired shapes & size.
